++ Web Applications

WA are [Applications] that are utilized from a [Browser].

TheSystem discourages WA an initial platform to built on. Instead WA are regarded as a DerivedPlatform.
    * DesktopFirst

    * Promotes external [Centralisation] so that [Data] is stored remotely and out of the [Users] control.

++Examples
Common WA include:
    * [Chat]
    * [Email]
    * [Forum]
    * IssueSystem
